Once placed, the item can no longer be put up for sale.
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow>The following may also result in loss of certain parts and furnishings:

  - Leaving or being discharged from the free
  company
  - Unsharing an estate
